# lockAFI(requestFlags:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sends the Lock AFI command (0x28 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
func lockAFI(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func lockAFI(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag) async throws
```

## Sending Application Family Identifier Commands

- **writeAFI(requestFlags:afi:completionHandler:)**: Sends the Write AFI command (0x27 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.
